story.paragraph1: Purvodaya Energy Solutions was born from a simple belief: everyone deserves access to clean, affordable energy. Founded in 2012 by a team of renewable energy engineers, we've grown from a small startup to the region's most trusted solar installation company.
story.paragraph2: Our mission goes beyond just installing solar panels. We're building a sustainable future, one installation at a time. Every project we complete brings us closer to a world powered entirely by renewable energy.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to have helped thousands of families and businesses make the switch to solar, saving millions in energy costs and preventing tons of CO₂ emissions.

responses.cost:
💰 **Solar System Costs in India:**

• **Residential (1-10kW):** ₹40,000-₹80,000 per kW
• **Commercial (10kW+):** ₹35,000-₹65,000 per kW
• **5kW home system:** ₹2-4 lakhs (after subsidies)
• **10kW system:** ₹4-7 lakhs (after subsidies)

*Prices include panels, inverter, installation & 5-year warranty*

Would you like a personalized quote? 📋
responses.financing:
💳 **Solar Financing Options:**

**1. Cash Purchase** ✅ Best ROI, immediate ownership
**2. Solar Loan** 🏦 2-6% interest, 5-15 year terms
**3. Lease/PPA** 📄 ₹0 down, pay monthly
**4. NBFC Financing** 💰 Up to 80% funding

**EMI Example:**
₹5L system → ₹8,500/month for 5 years
Savings: ₹12,000/month
**Net Benefit:** ₹3,500/month from day 1! 📈

Want to calculate your EMI? 🧮
responses.installation:
🔧 **Solar Installation Process:**

**Step 1:** Site Survey & Design (1-2 days)
**Step 2:** Permits & Approvals (7-15 days)
**Step 3:** Equipment Procurement (3-7 days)
**Step 4:** Installation (1-3 days)
**Step 5:** Grid Connection & Testing (2-5 days)
**Step 6:** Net Metering Setup (7-30 days)

⏱️ **Total Time:** 3-8 weeks
🏠 **Roof Requirements:** 100 sq ft per kW

Need a site assessment? We offer free surveys! 📋
responses.maintenance:
🧹 **Solar Maintenance Guide:**

**Monthly:** Visual inspection
**Quarterly:** Panel cleaning (more in dusty areas)
**Annually:** Professional checkup

**Cleaning Tips:**
• Early morning or evening
• Use soft brush and water
• Avoid harsh chemicals
• Professional cleaning available

**Monitoring:**
• Mobile app for performance tracking
• Alert system for issues
• Remote monitoring included

**Costs:** ₹2-5k annually
**Performance impact:** 15-20% loss if not cleaned

Want to know about our maintenance packages? 🔧
responses.savings:
📊 **Solar Savings Calculator:**

**Example 5kW System:**
• Monthly Generation: 750 units
• Current Bill: ₹15,000/month
• With Solar: ₹2,000/month
• **Monthly Savings: ₹13,000** 💰
• **Annual Savings: ₹1,56,000** 📈
• **25-year Savings: ₹39 lakhs** 🎯

**Payback Period:** 3-4 years
**ROI:** 25-30% annually

To calculate YOUR savings, I need:
• Monthly electricity bill amount
• Location (for sunlight hours)
• Roof space available

Shall we calculate your potential savings? 🧮
responses.subsidy:
🏛️ **Government Subsidies Available:**

• **Central Subsidy:** Up to ₹18,000 per kW (max 3kW)
• **State Subsidies:** Additional 10-30% in many states
• **Net Metering:** Sell excess power back to grid
• **Tax Benefits:** 30% depreciation for businesses
• **Low-interest loans:** 2-6% interest rates

**Example:** 5kW system costs ₹3L → After subsidy ₹1.8L

Which state are you in? I can check specific subsidies! 🗺️
responses.technical:
🔬 **Technical Information:**

**Panel Types:**
• Monocrystalline: 20-22% efficiency, premium
• Polycrystalline: 18-20% efficiency, economical
• Bifacial: 25% more power, latest technology

**Inverter Types:**
• String Inverters: Cost-effective
• Power Optimizers: Better performance
• Microinverters: Maximum efficiency

**System Specifications:**
• Warranty: 25 years on panels, 5-12 years on inverters
• Performance: 80% efficiency after 25 years
• Maintenance: Minimal, cleaning 2-4 times/year

Any specific technical questions? ⚙️
responses.types:
⚡ **Solar System Types:**

**🔌 On-Grid (Grid-Tied)**
• Connected to electricity grid
• Sell excess power back
• No battery backup
• Cost: ₹40-60k per kW
• Best for: Reliable grid areas

**🔋 Off-Grid (Standalone)**
• Complete independence
• Battery backup included
• Works during power cuts
• Cost: ₹80-120k per kW
• Best for: Remote areas

**⚡🔋 Hybrid System**
• Best of both worlds
• Grid connection + batteries
• Backup during outages
• Cost: ₹70-100k per kW
• Best for: Urban areas with power cuts

Which type interests you? 🤔

0.question: How much does a solar system cost?
0.answer: Solar system costs vary based on size and requirements. Residential systems (1-10kW) typically cost ₹40,000-₹80,000 per kW. A 5kW home system costs ₹2-4 lakhs after government subsidies. We provide free consultations and custom quotes based on your specific needs.

1.question: How much can I save with solar panels?
1.answer: Savings depend on your current electricity bill and system size. Most customers save 70-90% on their electricity bills. For example, if your monthly bill is ₹15,000, you could save ₹10,000-₹13,000 per month with a properly sized solar system.

2.question: What government subsidies are available?
2.answer: The government offers up to ₹18,000 per kW subsidy (maximum 3kW) for residential solar installations. Many states offer additional incentives. Net metering allows you to sell excess power back to the grid. We help you navigate all available subsidies and paperwork.

3.question: How long does installation take?
3.answer: Most residential installations are completed in 1-3 days. The entire process from site survey to grid connection typically takes 3-8 weeks, including permits and approvals. We handle all paperwork and coordinate with utility companies.

4.question: What maintenance is required?
4.answer: Solar panels require minimal maintenance. Clean panels 2-4 times per year and schedule annual professional inspections. Most systems come with 25-year warranties and monitoring apps to track performance.

5.question: Do solar panels work during power cuts?
5.answer: Standard grid-tied systems shut down during power cuts for safety. However, hybrid systems with battery backup can power essential loads during outages. We can design systems based on your backup power needs.

6.question: What is the lifespan of solar panels?
6.answer: Quality solar panels last 25+ years with minimal degradation. Most panels come with 25-year performance warranties guaranteeing 80% efficiency after 25 years. Inverters typically last 10-15 years and may need replacement once during the system's lifetime.

7.question: Is my roof suitable for solar panels?
7.answer: Most roofs are suitable for solar installations. We need approximately 100 square feet per kW of solar capacity. Our engineers conduct free site surveys to assess structural integrity, shading, and optimal panel placement for maximum energy generation.

0.name: Rajesh Kumar
0.text: Purvodaya Energy Solutions transformed our home with a 7kW solar system. Our monthly electricity bill dropped from ₹18,000 to just ₹2,500! The installation was professional, quick, and hassle-free. The team explained everything clearly and provided excellent after-sales support.

1.name: Priya Sharma
1.text: We've been using solar for 2 years now and couldn't be happier. The system has performed exactly as promised, and the savings are incredible. Purvodaya's team handled all the paperwork and approvals seamlessly. Highly recommend their services!

2.name: Amit Patel
2.text: Best investment we've made for our factory. The 50kW commercial system has reduced our operational costs significantly. The ROI was achieved in just 3.5 years. Professional team, quality equipment, and excellent maintenance service.

testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from satisfied customers who made the switch to solar.
testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say

0.name: Sunita Desai
0.text: Amazing experience with Purvodaya Energy! The solar installation was completed in just 2 days. Our electricity bills have reduced by 85%. The monitoring app is very helpful to track daily energy generation.

1.name: Ravi Krishnan
1.text: Excellent service from start to finish. The team was professional, punctual, and cleaned up after installation. The system is working perfectly and we're saving more than expected on our electricity bills.

2.name: Lakshmi Venkatesh
2.text: Very happy with our solar installation. The quality of panels and inverters is excellent. Customer support is responsive and helpful. Would definitely recommend Purvodaya Energy to others.

3.name: Mohammad Ali
3.text: Outstanding commercial solar solution for our office building. The system generates more power than projected. Professional installation team and excellent after-sales service.

4.name: Debashis Chatterjee
4.text: Great investment for our home. The solar panels are working efficiently even during monsoon season. Very professional team and transparent pricing. Highly satisfied with the service.

5.name: Kavita Agarwal
5.text: Exceeded our expectations! The solar system is generating more power than estimated. Excellent workmanship and quality components. The payback period will be even shorter than calculated.
